Class MainFeedListingsEndlessRecyclerViewAdapter

  • java.lang.Object

  • public class MainFeedListingsEndlessRecyclerViewAdapter
extends android.support.v7.widget.RecyclerView.Adapter<android.support.v7.widget.RecyclerView.ViewHolder>
